value:
$WmMPID_年明フランネル,ch05_50_Flannel_M_NewYear21,Face|Heh heh... Looks like the prey has
arrived. Get ready, everyone!$k$p$WmMPID_年明ベロア,ch05_48_Velour_F_NewYear21,Face|Together, Daddy and I can't be beat!
We'll break all your precious stuff,
and add it to the treasure pile!$k$p$WmMPID_年明ニシキ,ch05_49_Nishiki_M_NewYear21,Face|I took some extra time to maintain
my tail for the new year, you know.
You aren't going to ruin it, are you?$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_年明ニシキ,ch05_49_Nishiki_M_NewYear21,Face|If this keeps up, all the care I've put
into my tail will be ruined before the
night ends! ...Retreat!$k$p$WmMPID_年明フランネル,ch05_50_Flannel_M_NewYear21,Face|We'll finish you later!$k$p$Sbs150|
